# Proofs

The first proof strategies in *How To Prove It* are presented in Section 3.2, so that is where we begin.

## 3.2. Proofs Involving Negations and Conditionals {.unnumbered}

When stating proof strategies, can give before-and-after versions of tactic state:

::: {.befaft}

<p class="hdr">Tactic state before using strategy</p>

<p class="hdr">Tactic state after using strategy</p>

```state
- ⋮
⊢ P → Q
```

```state
- ⋮
h : P
⊢ Q
```
:::
